attributes.action: Stop the NHS Mandate for the covid-19 Vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: Removal of the right to choose our medical care goes against our NHS and own professional work ethics. Will we be expected to continue as advocates for our service- users when we are unable to do so for ourselves and our colleagues? The vaccines do not provide robust protection against re-infection or transmission. The manufacturers, developers and the distributors of these vaccines assume no liability in the event of a poor health outcome.
attributes.background: Stop the NHS Mandate and prevent the sacking and job losses of thousands of staff in the NHS and other CQC registered services.
